title: The Draft Has Returned ...
description:
On today's show we've got 2 ROUNDS in the magazine .. ROUND #1 - It's the first ever INTEGRITY DRAFT! Today's topic is the HOTTEST ACTORS IN A MILITARY MOVIE. Remember, this isn't just any draft, this is a draft of integrity. If any member of the squad commits an Integrity Violation during the week they will LOSE A DRAFT PICK! ROUND #2 - Duuuuude, where’s my tank… A Canadian soldier gave out cannabis cupcakes to her fellow troops during a training exercise, and now she’s probably freakin’ out, man SUPPORT THE SHOW!
